pull.title: log: Use steady clock for bench logging
pull.body: Instead of using `0.001` and similar constants to "convert" an int64_t to milliseconds, use the type-safe `Ticks<>` helper. Also, use steady clock instead of system clock, since the durations are used for benchmarking.

verification.payload:
tree 6304060c0741b5f04816330025e6db12919a7f7c
parent 9fefd00d8e672c045c87538e7a6c72183cc0f2e6

committer MacroFake <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1663577149 +0200

scripted-diff: Rename time symbols

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-

 ren() { sed -i "s:\<$1\>:$2:g" $(git grep -l "\<$1\>" ':(exclude)src/versionbits.cpp') ; }

 ren nStart                 time_start
 ren nTimeStart             time_start
 ren nTimeReadFromDiskTotal time_read_from_disk_total
 ren nTimeConnectTotal      time_connect_total
 ren nTimeFlush             time_flush
 ren nTimeChainState        time_chainstate
 ren nTimePostConnect       time_post_connect
 ren nTimeCheck             time_check
 ren nTimeForks             time_forks
 ren nTimeConnect           time_connect
 ren nTimeVerify            time_verify
 ren nTimeUndo              time_undo
 ren nTimeIndex             time_index
 ren nTimeTotal             time_total
 ren nTime1                 time_1
 ren nTime2                 time_2
 ren nTime3                 time_3
 ren nTime4                 time_4
 ren nTime5                 time_5
 ren nTime6                 time_6

 ren nBlocksTotal num_blocks_total

 # Newline after semicolon
 perl -0777 -pi -e 's/; time_connect_total/;\n        time_connect_total/g' src/validation.cpp
 perl -0777 -pi -e 's/; time_/;\n    time_/g'                               src/validation.cpp

-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25830](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25830) (refactor: Replace m_params with chainman.GetParams() by aureleoules)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

issue.title: refactor: Replace m_params with chainman.GetParams()
issue.body:
Fixes a TODO introduced in #24595.
Removes `m_params` from `CChainState` class and replaces it with `m_chainman.GetParams()`.

events.body: ACK fabf1cdb206e368a9433abf99a5ea2762a5ed2c0 - validation bench output still looks sane.
